title: Arposandran War

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Arposandran War is an unofficial name given to the conflict around which the Gnome quest series revolves. The Arposandran War is currently being waged by Arposandra against the Gnome Empire, although the advanced simian civilisation of Ape Atoll has also become involved.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Arposandran War
 This topic name is not found in-game.
While the name or title of this topic is not officially recognised in-game, the information contained on this page is still considered to be canon and is based on official sources.
Arposandran War
Beginning Non-specific
End Ongoing
Place Gnome Empire, Arposandra
Outcome Ongoing
Battles None
Combatants
Gnome Empire Arposandra, Ape Atoll, Gu'Tanoth, Troll Stronghold
Commanders
King Narnode Shareen, King Bolren, Hazelmere, Bolrie Glouphrie, Glough, King Awowogei (independent)
Casualties
Nieve, unknown amount of others Glough, Kruk, Jungle Demon, unknown amount of others
Other wars
Concurrent war Khazard - Gnome War
Previous war Thorobshuun - Gnome War

The Arposandran War is an unofficial name given to the conflict around which the Gnome quest series revolves. The Arposandran War is currently being waged by Arposandra against the Gnome Empire, although the advanced simian civilisation of Ape Atoll has also become involved.

Until Glough's invasion, the Arposandran Wars saw very little open combat between the two sides and consisted almost entirely of espionage.

Known incidents:

  • Glough attempts to poison the Grand Tree using Daconia rocks. He is eventually stopped and forced to flee.
  • Arposandra sends several Cute creatures to the Tree Gnome Stronghold and Tree Gnome Village to spy on the locations, and a Saboteur to break a protective device built by Oaknock the Engineer, but an adventurer repairs the device an uncovers their true purpose.
  • The Tree Gnome Stronghold sends the 10th Squad to Ape Atoll to investigate the actions of the monkeys and Arposandra. The squad is discovered and forced to fight a Jungle demon with the aid of the adventurer, before returning to their observations.
  • The Tree Gnome Stronghold sends the adventurer to Ape Atoll to investigate the disappearance of Glough. The adventurer discovers that Glough is constructing airships and an army of demonic gorillas and has formed an alliance with the monkeys of Ape Atoll, the Gu'Tanoth ogres, and the trolls of Troll Stronghold in order to invade the Tree Gnome Stronghold. Glough is eventually defeated and his army is driven back, although not without some sacrifice.

The '''Arposandran War''' is an unofficial name given to the conflict around which the [[Gnome quest series]] revolves. The Arposandran War is currently being waged by [[Arposandra]] against the [[Gnome Empire]], although the advanced [[wikipedia:Simian|simian]] civilisation of [[Ape Atoll]] has also become involved.

Until [[Glough]]'s invasion, the Arposandran Wars saw very little open combat between the two sides and consisted almost entirely of espionage.

Known incidents:
*Glough [[The Grand Tree|attempts]] to poison the [[Grand Tree]] using [[Daconia rock]]s. He is eventually stopped and forced to flee.

*Arposandra [[Eyes of Glouphrie|sends]] several [[Cute creature]]s to the [[Tree Gnome Stronghold]] and [[Tree Gnome Village]] to spy on the locations, and a [[Saboteur]] to [[The Eyes of Glouphrie|break a protective device]] built by [[Oaknock the Engineer]], but an adventurer repairs the device an uncovers their true purpose.

*The Tree Gnome Stronghold [[Monkey Madness I|sends]] the [[10th Squad]] to [[Ape Atoll]] to investigate the actions of the monkeys and Arposandra. The squad is discovered and forced to fight a [[Jungle demon]] with the aid of the adventurer, before returning to their observations.

*The Tree Gnome Stronghold [[Monkey Madness II|sends]] the adventurer to Ape Atoll to investigate the disappearance of Glough. The adventurer discovers that Glough is constructing airships and an army of [[demonic gorilla]]s and has formed an alliance with the [[monkey]]s of Ape Atoll, the [[Gu'Tanoth]] [[ogres]], and the [[trolls]] of [[Troll Stronghold]] in order to invade the Tree Gnome Stronghold. Glough is eventually defeated and his army is driven back, although not without some sacrifice.
